2285318242975215882.Text: I found Mossanon in Sadrith Mora and confronted him about the embezzled funds. He admitted his crime, and offered to return 2500 gold -- he had spent the rest -- and pay back the rest as soon as he could, if I'd promise to keep his whereabouts secret from Canctunian Ponius. I refused to keep his secret, and he refused to return the gold.

108821828413715175.Text: I found Mossanon in Sadrith Mora and confronted him about the embezzled funds. He admitted his crime, and offered to return 2500 gold -- he had spent the rest -- and pay back the rest as soon as he could, if I'd promise to keep his whereabouts secret from Canctunian Ponius. I demanded the gold, and refused to keep his secret. I made it clear he was in no position to dictate terms, and he yielded the 2500 gold to me without a fight.

5326295842293121380.Text: Imperial Cult: Pledge from Canctunian Ponius
